cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Bankruptcy
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: Is the economic operator bankrupt? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

cac:TenderingCriterionProperty.cbc:Description: Indicate reasons for being nevertheless to perform the contract
Is this information available at no cost to the authorities from an EU Member State database?

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Insolvency
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: Is the economic operator the subject of insolvency or winding-up? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

cac:TenderingCriterionProperty.cbc:Description: Indicate reasons for being nevertheless to perform the contract
Is this information available at no cost to the authorities from an EU Member State database?

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Arrangement with creditors
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: Is the economic operator in arrangement with creditors? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

cac:TenderingCriterionProperty.cbc:Description: Indicate reasons for being nevertheless to perform the contract
Is this information available at no cost to the authorities from an EU Member State database?

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Analogous situation like bankruptcy under national law
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: Is the economic operator in any analogous situation like bankruptcy arising from a similar procedure under national laws and regulations? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

cac:TenderingCriterionProperty.cbc:Description: Indicate reasons for being nevertheless to perform the contract
Is this information available at no cost to the authorities from an EU Member State database?

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Assets being administered by liquidator
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: Are the assets of the economic operator being administered by a liquidator or by the court? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

cac:TenderingCriterionProperty.cbc:Description: Indicate reasons for being nevertheless to perform the contract
Is this information available at no cost to the authorities from an EU Member State database?

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Business activities are suspended
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: Are the business activities of the economic operator suspended? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

cac:TenderingCriterionProperty.cbc:Description: Indicate reasons for being nevertheless to perform the contract
Is this information available at no cost to the authorities from an EU Member State database?
